mapping.waarde: {% set count = 0 %}{% if value is iterable %}{% for subvalue in value %}{% if subvalue is iterable %}{% for subsubvalue in subvalue %}{% if count != 0 %}, {% endif %}{{ subsubvalue }}{% set count = count + 1 %}{% endfor %}{% else %}{% if count != 0 %}, {% endif %}{{ subvalue }}{% set count = count + 1 %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{% else %}{% if count != 0 %}, {% endif %}{{ value }}{% set count = count + 1 %}{% endif %}
mapping.eigenschap: {% for eigenschap in eigenschappen %}{% if eigenschap.naam == name %}{{ eigenschap['_self']['id'] }}{% endif %}{% endfor %}
